text: Dusha ne umirayet inache, kak s dozvoleniya Allakha, soobrazno Knige, v kotoroy opredelon srok zhizni. Kto zhelayet sebe nagrady v blizhayshey zhizni, Allakh yemu daruyet yeyo, a kto zhelayet nagrady v posleduyushchey zhizni, Allakh yemu daruyet yeyo. Allakh vozdast blagodarnym, kotoryye povinovalis' Yemu i srazhalis' za Yego pryamoy put'
